LanguageData.Hediffs_SocialLv1.label: Socializing Expertise Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_SocialLv1.description: Shakō (Socializing) Expertise Tip 1: The Level 1 and 2 buff of this skill may be activated by simple meals, luxury items, and processed foods.
LanguageData.Hediffs_SocialLv2.label: Socializing Expertise Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_SocialLv2.description: Shakō (Socializing) Expertise Tip 2: Dietary restrictions are required to effectively obtain the Level 3 and 4 permanent buffs.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Social.label: Socializing Expertise
LanguageData.Hediffs_Social.description: Shakō (Socializing) Expertise: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Social.stages.0.label: initial
